original_title: かつて文学少女だった国語教師が、いつしか情事に溺れて…。 松下紗栄子
overview: Saeko Matsushita is a Japanese language teacher who is about to marry a colleague teacher. Her fiancee wants her to change job but she quite enjoys her teaching job. These demands cause some frictions with the couple.  Under these circumstances, the school clerk learns what’s going on and takes advantage of both the situation and the hot female teacher.
title: Former Nerdy Girl Turned Teacher Gets Caught Up In A Love Affair… Saeko Matsushita
